article_title: The Future Of Healthcare Is Less Privacy

article_metadata.author: Modeled Behavior

og.description: A crucial problem in healthcare is lack of information and lack of incentives. As I've argued before, I believe the trend of constant monitoring, data capture, and analysis is likely to change this in a very important ways. A new story from Bloomberg shows us how this is already beginning: [...]
